name: Pixel Campfire
description:
I had made a little pixel campfire scene for another project, and I kind of fell in love with just leaving that scene open. So, I fleshed it out and turned it into this little idle "screensaver" for you! I will probably add music and some other backgrounds, etc. Time will tell!

If you like it and are able, please consider a small donation to help support my project in development (and my family!)

(Title screen says Pixidle Campfire, but I decided that was too confusing. I will update the logo soon)
